title: Ancient imprints: Bolivian tracksite reveals dinosaur behaviour secrets
description: Now a team of paleontologists, mostly from California’s Loma Linda University, have discovered and documented 16,600 such footprints left by theropods, the dinosaur group that includes the Tyrannosaurus rex.
